SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

[2023-10-13 16:06:52 INF] Executed DbCommand (32ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [p].[Id], [p].[Amount], [p].[AppUserId], [p].[CreationTime], [p].[CreatorUserId], [p].[Date], [p].[DeleteUserId], [p].[DeletionTime], [p].[IsDeleted], [p].[LastModificationTime], [p].[LastModifierUserId], [p].[Punish], [p].[Reason], [p].[UserId]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-10-14 20:00:12 INF] Executed DbCommand (466ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

[2023-10-14 20:00:18 INF] Executed DbCommand (48ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

[2023-10-14 20:00:47 INF] Executed DbCommand (21ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-10-14 20:00:47 INF] Executing ObjectResult, writing value of type 'CoreApiResponse.ApiResponse'.

[2023-10-14 20:00:47 INF] Request finished HTTP/2 GET https://localhost:7114/api/Notification/getAll/503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca - - - 200 - application/json;+charset=utf-8 40.2568ms
[2023-10-14 20:00:47 INF] Executed DbCommand (37ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-10-14 21:07:13 INF] Executing ObjectResult, writing value of type 'CoreApiResponse.ApiResponse'.

[2023-10-14 21:07:13 INF] Executed endpoint 'HRM.Controllers.NotificationController.GetAll (HRM)'
[2023-10-14 21:07:13 INF] Request finished HTTP/2 GET https://localhost:7114/api/Notification/getAll/503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca - - - 200 - application/json;+charset=utf-8 206.7627ms
[2023-10-14 21:07:13 INF] Executed DbCommand (115ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='503e5e44-1df2-4d96-aa99-d9027414bbca'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

[2023-10-14 21:35:23 INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='b70b80db-e51f-4340-9a23-8a1a2550762b'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

[2023-10-14 21:35:23 INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='b70b80db-e51f-4340-9a23-8a1a2550762b'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

CREATE TABLE [Employee] (
    [Id] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL,
    [AppUserId] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL,
    [UserCode] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [FullName] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL,
    [Gender] bit NOT NULL,
    [Phone] nvarchar(50) NOT NULL,
    [DoB] datetime2 NOT NULL,
    [Level] int NOT NULL,
    [PositionId] uniqueidentifier NOT NULL,
    [DepartmentId] uniqueidentifier NULL,
    [JoinDate] datetime2 NOT NULL,
    [IsActive] bit NOT NULL,
    [Bank] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [BankAccount] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [TaxCode] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [InsuranceStatus] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [Identify] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [PlaceOfOrigin] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [PlaceOfResidence] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [DateOfIssue] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [IssuedBy] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [Status] smallint NOT NULL,
    [CreatorUserId] uniqueidentifier NULL,
    [CreationTime] datetime2 NULL,
    [LastModifierUserId] uniqueidentifier NULL,
    [LastModificationTime] datetime2 NULL,
    [DeleteUserId] uniqueidentifier NULL,
    [DeletionTime] datetime2 NULL,
    [IsDeleted] bit NOT NULL DEFAULT CAST(0 AS bit),
    CONSTRAINT [PK_Employee] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]),
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Employee_AppUser_AppUserId] FOREIGN KEY ([AppUserId]) REFERENCES [AppUser] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Employee_Department_DepartmentId] FOREIGN KEY ([DepartmentId]) REFERENCES [Department] ([Id]),
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Employee_Position_PositionId] FOREIGN KEY ([PositionId]) REFERENCES [Position] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]

    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

[2023-10-15 17:02:23 INF] Executed DbCommand (33ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='b70b80db-e51f-4340-9a23-8a1a2550762b'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (

FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]

    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]

    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (

    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]

    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC
[2023-10-17 09:16:19 INF] Executed DbCommand (597ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='afa85280-196a-4da5-bfeb-29e20f4eb814'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]

    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]

    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

[2023-10-17 09:51:08 INF] Executed DbCommand (16ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='afa85280-196a-4da5-bfeb-29e20f4eb814'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]

    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (

    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (

FROM [Message] AS [m]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

FROM [Message] AS [m]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]

    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    FROM [Employee] AS [e]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
