    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

FROM [Message] AS [m]

    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]

    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (

    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]

    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    FROM [Employee] AS [e]

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (

    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]

    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]

SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[UserCode], [a].[Id], [t].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [e].[FullName], [e].[Gender], [a].[Email], [a].[Password], [e].[Phone], [e].[DoB], [e].[Level], [e].[PositionId], [e].[DepartmentId], [e].[JoinDate], [e].[Bank], [e].[BankAccount], [e].[TaxCode], [e].[InsuranceStatus], [e].[Identify], [e].[PlaceOfOrigin], [e].[PlaceOfResidence], [e].[DateOfIssue], [e].[IssuedBy]
FROM [Employee] AS [e]
INNER JOIN [AppUser] AS [a] ON [e].[AppUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]
) AS [t] ON [a].[Id] = [t].[UserId]
WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint) AND [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [e].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-11-03 10:41:27 INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='bf1815b6-7966-4172-eeef-08dbcebbd342'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]

FROM [Employee] AS [e]
INNER JOIN [AppUser] AS [a] ON [e].[AppUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]
) AS [t] ON [a].[Id] = [t].[UserId]
WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint) AND [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [e].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]

    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]
) AS [t] ON [a].[Id] = [t].[UserId]
WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint) AND [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [e].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-11-03 10:57:55 INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='bf1815b6-7966-4172-eeef-08dbcebbd342'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (

FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)

    FROM [Employee] AS [e]

    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

FROM [Employee] AS [e]

SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[UserCode], [a].[Id], [t].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [e].[FullName], [e].[Gender], [a].[Email], [a].[Password], [e].[Phone], [e].[DoB], [e].[Level], [e].[PositionId], [e].[DepartmentId], [e].[JoinDate], [e].[Bank], [e].[BankAccount], [e].[TaxCode], [e].[InsuranceStatus], [e].[Identify], [e].[PlaceOfOrigin], [e].[PlaceOfResidence], [e].[DateOfIssue], [e].[IssuedBy]
FROM [Employee] AS [e]
INNER JOIN [AppUser] AS [a] ON [e].[AppUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]
) AS [t] ON [a].[Id] = [t].[UserId]
WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint) AND [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [e].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)

    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[UserCode], [a].[Id], [t].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [e].[FullName], [e].[Gender], [a].[Email], [a].[Password], [e].[Phone], [e].[DoB], [e].[Level], [e].[PositionId], [e].[DepartmentId], [e].[JoinDate], [e].[Bank], [e].[BankAccount], [e].[TaxCode], [e].[InsuranceStatus], [e].[Identify], [e].[PlaceOfOrigin], [e].[PlaceOfResidence], [e].[DateOfIssue], [e].[IssuedBy]
FROM [Employee] AS [e]
INNER JOIN [AppUser] AS [a] ON [e].[AppUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]
) AS [t] ON [a].[Id] = [t].[UserId]
WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint) AND [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [e].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

INNER JOIN [AppUser] AS [a] ON [e].[AppUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]
) AS [t] ON [a].[Id] = [t].[UserId]
WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Status] = @__stt_0 AND [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
ORDER BY [e].[Id], [a].[Id], [t].[Id]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-11-03 13:42:41 INF] Executed DbCommand (10ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='bf1815b6-7966-4172-eeef-08dbcebbd342'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-11-03 13:47:33 INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='bf1815b6-7966-4172-eeef-08dbcebbd342'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (

    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

[2023-11-03 13:58:34 INF] Executed DbCommand (22ms) [Parameters=[@__stt_0='3'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[UserCode], [e].[AppUserId], [a].[Id], [t].[Id], [t].[Name], [t].[Id0], [e].[FullName], [e].[Gender], [a].[Email], [a].[Password], [e].[Phone], [e].[DoB], [e].[Level], [e].[PositionId], [e].[DepartmentId], [e].[JoinDate], [e].[Bank], [e].[BankAccount], [e].[TaxCode], [e].[InsuranceStatus], [e].[Identify], [e].[PlaceOfOrigin], [e].[PlaceOfResidence], [e].[DateOfIssue], [e].[IssuedBy]
FROM [Employee] AS [e]
INNER JOIN [AppUser] AS [a] ON [e].[AppUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]
    INNER JOIN [AppUserRole] AS [a1] ON [a0].[Id] = [a1].[RoleId]
) AS [t] ON [a].[Id] = [t].[UserId]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-11-03 14:20:59 INF] Executed DbCommand (44ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='bf1815b6-7966-4172-eeef-08dbcebbd342'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
[2023-11-03 14:33:40 INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__id_0='bf1815b6-7966-4172-eeef-08dbcebbd342'], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]

    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

FROM [Employee] AS [e]
INNER JOIN [AppUser] AS [a] ON [e].[AppUserId] = [a].[Id]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a0].[Id], [a0].[Name], [a1].[Id] AS [Id0], [a1].[UserId]
    FROM [AppRole] AS [a0]

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [m].[Id], [m].[SenderId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [m].[SenderId] AND [e].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [SenderUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [m].[SenderId]) AS [SenderPhotoUrl], [m].[RecipientId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e0].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e0]
    WHERE [e0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId] AND [e0].[Status] = CAST(3 AS smallint)) AS [RecipientUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a0].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a0]
    WHERE [a0].[Id] = [m].[RecipientId]) AS [RecipientPhotoUrl], [m].[Content], [m].[DateRead], [m].[MessageSent], (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM [Message] AS [m0]
    WHERE [m0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[SenderId] = [m].[SenderId] AND [m0].[RecipientId] = @__id_0 AND ([m0].[DateRead] IS NULL)) AS [TotalUnSeen]
FROM [Message] AS [m]
WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND ([m].[SenderId] = @__id_0 OR [m].[RecipientId] = @__id_0)
ORDER BY [m].[MessageSent] DESC

SELECT [n].[Id], [n].[Thumbnail], [n].[Title], [n].[CreateDate], [t].[IsRead], [n].[CreatorUserId] AS [CreateUserId], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[FullName]
    FROM [Employee] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [e].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserName], (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[AvatarUrl]
    FROM [AppUser] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Id] = [n].[CreatorUserId]) AS [CreateUserPhoto]
FROM [Notification] AS [n]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [n0].[EmployeeId], [n0].[IsDeleted], [n0].[IsRead], [n0].[NotificationId]
    FROM [NotificationEmployee] AS [n0]
    WHERE [n0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [t] ON [n].[Id] = [t].[NotificationId]
WHERE [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [t].[EmployeeId] = @__id_0 AND [t].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [n].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
